Pre-Game Insights: The Bucks are on a 4-game road losing streak and will look to break it against the Knicks.
The Knicks finished the 2023-24 season with a record of 50-32 overall and 35-17 in Eastern Conference games.
Others: The BETMGM SPORTSBOOK line for the game is Knicks -7.5, with an over/under of 225.5.

Injury updates: Cameron Payne (hamstring) and Precious Achiuwa (hamstring) are day to day for the Knicks, while Mitchell Robinson (ankle) is out. For the Bucks, Khris Middleton (ankle) and Giannis Antetokounmpo (adductor) are day to day.
